msbt.message: BUNNY DAAAAAY!<10_9 />That means candy eggs! Everywhere! Tooexcitedcan'tcontain
Zipper's always dancing! And it made me wanna dance! And then I danced with him!<10_4 /> And now I'm not.

Have you found any candy eggs yet? Have you tried eating them? Wanna know which color tastes the best?A huh huh! It's a tie! They're all the yummiest, !Can you keep a secret? <10_4 />I think leaf eggs are the yummiestest 'cause they're green.

So I've been thinkingBunny Day is all about candy eggs.And Bunny Day balloons are really colorfuljust like candy eggs!AND! Some Bunny Day balloons are carrying DIY recipes to make stuff out ofcandy eggs!It's like it was all meant to be, !

I bit into a candy egg I found on the beach and it wasn't a candy egg at all. It was a message bottle!I think maybe there was a DIY recipe inside or something Once I found out it wasn't candy, I lost interest.
I heard there's candy eggs buried in the ground. Think they'll sprout into a candy-egg tree? I sure hope so
あのさ、 いわのたまごってのを 食べてみたけどよぉなまえ名前のせいかほか他のたまごより なんだか かた硬かったき気がするないわのたまごといやぁ、どうもさいきん最近 たぬきマイルでい行ける むじんとう無人島だかに ゴロゴロ ころ転がってるってはなし話だぜ、
Ever wondered why eggs fall out of trees if you hit them around Bunny Day?<10_4 /> Me neither, .
イースター それは ゆめ夢ときぼう希望にあふれる タマゴのさいてん祭典さっき たまごがた型のふうせん風船が と飛んでいたよ フフフ、あれも た食べられるのかな？
ねぇねぇ、 フルーツのなってない木を ゆらしたら、 たまごが おちてきたんだぁ～たまごのなる木！ 大発見だねぇ、
Do fish celebrate Bunny Day? 'Cause I went fishing and caught an egg instead of a fish, .Happy Bunny Day, fishies!
